subject: Leadership
title: Ethical Leadership at Scale
description: A quick win: understand Ethical Leadership at Scale.

hook.text: Leading ethically yourself is hard. Ensuring thousands of employees act ethically? That's a different challenge.

buildup.text: Trevino and Brown: ethical leadership must cascade. Middle managers are the link between policy and daily behavior.

discovery.text: Employees model their direct supervisor, not the CEO. Ethical tone at the middle matters more than tone at the top.

twist.text: Pressure to hit targets is the top reason managers compromise. If goals are unrealistic, shortcuts become logical.

climax.text: Set realistic targets. Train middle managers in ethics. Measure how goals are achieved, not just whether they are.

punchline.text: Ethics at scale isn't about rules. It's about the people who enforce them.

quiz.question: Who most influences employee ethical behavior?
